ingredient.preparation: cut into thin strips on the diagonal

instructions.step: In a wok or skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add beef strips one to three at a time. Stir-fry for three minutes or until browned, removing the done pieces to a plate lined with paper towels.
Return all the beef to the wok. Stir in orange peel, garlic, and ginger; stir-fry one minute.

In a medium bowl, combine cornstarch, broth, soy sauce, sherry, marmalade, and red pepper. Pour this mixture into the beef, stirring constantly. Bring to a boil over medium heat and cook for one minute.
